address: Xã Ia Trok, Huyện Ia Pa, Tỉnh Gia Lai
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Ia Trok, Huyện Ia Pa, Tỉnh Gia Lai"**

Okay, so I've been asked to figure out the new administrative unit for "Xã Ia Trok" in Gia Lai. My process is pretty straightforward: first, I need to check the relevant resolutions and the new ward data.

First, I checked if anything drastic happened at the provincial level. *Resolution 60-NQ/TW* doesn't indicate any changes for Gia Lai itself, so that's good.

Next, I zeroed in on the *1664/NQ-UBTVQH15* resolution, specifically regarding Gia Lai. Line 53 of the resolution mentions "Xã Chư Sê," but that doesn't include "Ia Trok." But then, I hit paydirt on line 80! It explicitly states that "Xã Ia Mrơn, Kim Tân, and Ia Trôk" will be combined into the new "Xã Ia Pa." Bingo! That confirms "Ia Trok" is part of the new "Ia Pa." I don't need to consider *1676/NQ-UBTVQH15* because that applies to Phú Thọ.

Finally, I validated my findings with the provided new ward data. I saw that there's indeed a "Xã Ia Pa" with code "24022" in Gia Lai. While I could confirm the new "Xã Chư Sê," I found the matching information in resolution 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15, so I can ignore irrelevant information.

Based on *resolution 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15* line 80 and the new ward information, I'm highly confident that the old "Xã Ia Trok" is now part of the new "Xã Ia Pa" in Gia Lai.

citation.header: 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Gia Lai
citation.line: 80. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Ia Mrơn, Kim Tân và Ia Trôk thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Ia Pa**.
